com.github.triceo.splitlog

Class DefaultLogWatchBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.triceo.splitlog.api.LogWatchBuilder
      • com.github.triceo.splitlog.DefaultLogWatchBuilder

  • public final class DefaultLogWatchBuilder
extends LogWatchBuilder
    Prepares an instance of LogWatch. Unless overriden by the user, the instance will have the following properties:
    Default gating condition
    SplitlogMessagesRejectingCondition.
    Default storage condition
    AllFollowerMessagesAcceptingCondition.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public LogWatch build()
        Description copied from class: LogWatchBuilder
        Build the log watch with previously defined properties, or defaults where not overriden. Such log watch will not start actually reading LogWatchBuilder.getFileToWatch() until after LogWatch.startFollowing() or MessageProducer.startConsuming(com.github.triceo.splitlog.api.MessageListener) .
        Specified by:
        build in class LogWatchBuilder
        Returns:
        The newly built log watch.

      • buildFollowing

        public Follower buildFollowing()
        Description copied from class: LogWatchBuilder
        Build the log watch with previously defined properties, or defaults where not overriden, and immediately start listening for Messages.
        Specified by:
        buildFollowing in class LogWatchBuilder
        Returns:
        The follower that will receive the initial messages. The actual LogWatch can be retrieved by Follower.getFollowed().

      • buildFollowingWith

        public Follower buildFollowingWith(TailSplitter splitter)
        Description copied from class: LogWatchBuilder
        Build the log watch with previously defined properties, or defaults where not overriden, and immediately start listening for Messages
        Specified by:
        buildFollowingWith in class LogWatchBuilder
        Parameters:
        splitter - The splitter instance to use for the log watch instead of the default.
        Returns:
        The follower that will receive the initial messages. The actual LogWatch can be retrieved by Follower.getFollowed().

      • buildWith

        public LogWatch buildWith(TailSplitter splitter)
        Description copied from class: LogWatchBuilder
        Build the log watch with previously defined properties, or defaults where not overriden. Such log watch will not start actually reading LogWatchBuilder.getFileToWatch() until after LogWatch.startFollowing() or MessageProducer.startConsuming(com.github.triceo.splitlog.api.MessageListener) .
        Specified by:
        buildWith in class LogWatchBuilder
        Parameters:
        splitter - The splitter instance to use for the log watch instead of the default.
        Returns:
        The newly built log watch. This log watch will not start tailing until after LogWatch.startFollowing() or MessageProducer.startConsuming(com.github.triceo.splitlog.api.MessageListener) .
